bibl.title: Why "Parachoresis"?
bibl.note: The conceptualization of the institution as reflected in its designation by the term parachoresis.
bibl.seg: Symposion 1985. Vorträge zur griechischen und hellenistischen Rechtsgeschichte (Ringberg, 24.-26. Juli 1985) (Köln - Wien, 1989) pp. 311-315.
The conceptualization of the institution as reflected in its designation by the term parachoresis.
